name: MonKanzi
description:
This is most probably the last version I'll mix. This is mon kanzi (my kanzi), It's an absolute smooth and delicious fruity all day Vape.
I'm certain most of you will like it. This Strawberry combination/layering is very tasty in other vapes as well, hint hint.

Kiwi Double (TPA) 2.5%
Juicy Strawberry (FA) 2%
Red Touch (Strawberry) (FA) 1%
Strawberry (Ripe) (TPA) 3%
Sweet Watermelon (CAP) 6%
Super Sweet (CAP) 0.75%

Let me know if you like it so please comment.
Enjoy,
Screwdriver
author: Screwdriver

reviews.text: This recipe is tasty as it is. I'm getting mostly the watermelon with the strawberries coming in later. The only thing that doesn't totally appeal to me is the sweetener, which is leaving na aftertaste in my mouth. I'll try making the next batch with a little less of it. Very good fruity adv overall, though.
Pretty tasty! Starting to mend a little more on a shake I got almost all tangerine now the other flavors are mixing in well and the tangerine is mellowing out. Nice recipe I enjoy it.
